attributes.action: ABOLITION OF OFFICE OF PRIME MINISTER
attributes.additional_details: That the Office of Prime Minister of Great Britain and Northern Ireland be abolished. The Office is a Function of the Ascendancy of the English in the Affairs of the British, and it is the Ascendancy of the English in the Affairs of the British that is the source of Irish disaffection with Britishness and cause therefore of the difficulty in Ireland. The Leader of the biggest Party in England should simply be First Minister for England and the Leadership of the British a Collective Affair for the Leaders of the biggest Parties in England, Scotland, Wales and Ireland as a Whole. It is a Refinement and a Development of the Doctrine of Collective Responsibility that this Petition represents, and its Purpose to prevent the Concentration of too much Power in any one Country in the Collective.
